name: Everstake
description: Everstake is one of the world’s biggest validators, servicing 735,000+ users across 70+ blockchains. As an operator on Ethereum, we handle 2.5% of the staked ETH supply or ~900,000+ ETH from 20,000+ stakers.Everstake has validated Ethereum since PoS genesis, retaining a slashing-free operation. We boast ~99.9% uptime, battle-tested infrastructure, and a team of seasoned experts. In Symbiotic, Everstake’s mission is to secure the most promising networks and provide the best delegation services for stakers.
